attributes.action: ensure trade unions are financially liable to the public for any disruption they cause.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Should a strike be called that affects the transport infrastructure and causes the public hardship in getting to work or causes them to be out of pocket in ensuring that they can get to and from work the trade union that called the strike should be held liable.  EG should the train services be cancelled and as a result the worker has to a. hire a car or b. stay in a hotel as they would be unable otherwise to get to work that cost should be met by the union.  Also should the business be forced to close its doors early to accomodate reduced public transport they should also compensated for loss of projected turnover.
